osyfe

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides some utility methods.

      Utils()

      static java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Byte> it(java.io.InputStream stream)
      Provides an iterator for a stream.
      static void loop(java.lang.String name, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> running, java.lang.Runnable timer, java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Float> worker, float fps_cap)
      Loops the worker function with provided passed time since the last iteration while the condition is met.
      static void loopThreaded(java.lang.String name, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> running, java.lang.Runnable timer, java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Float> worker, float fps_cap)
      Calls start in an extra thread.
      static float rgb(float srgb)
      Converts a sRGB to a RGB value.
      static long size(java.lang.String file)
      Gives the size in bytes of the given file.
      static float srgb(float rgb)
      Converts a RGB to a sRGB value.
      static float[] srgb(float h, float s, float v)
      Converts a HSV to a sRGB color. h is interpreted periodically with a period of 2*PI, 0 being red, s and v should be normalized in [0, 1].

      • loop

        public static void loop(java.lang.String name,
                        java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> running,
                        java.lang.Runnable timer,
                        java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Float> worker,
                        float fps_cap)
        Loops the worker function with provided passed time since the last iteration while the condition is met. The timer is called once each loop.

      • loopThreaded

        public static void loopThreaded(java.lang.String name,
                                java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Boolean> running,
                                java.lang.Runnable timer,
                                java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Float> worker,

        Calls start in an extra thread.

        public static float rgb(float srgb)
        Converts a sRGB to a RGB value.

      • size

        public static long size(java.lang.String file)
        Gives the size in bytes of the given file.

      • srgb

        public static float srgb(float rgb)
        Converts a RGB to a sRGB value.

      • srgb

        public static float[] srgb(float h,
                           float s,
                           float v)
        Converts a HSV to a sRGB color. h is interpreted periodically with a period of 2*PI, 0 being red, s and v should be normalized in [0, 1].
